## 🛰️ Apollo Memory & VRAM Optimizer
**Apollo Memory & VRAM Optimizer** is the ultimate tool for Minecraft players and modders looking to keep their game smooth and stable! Designed to tackle memory and VRAM management issues, this mod ensures better performance by automatically cleaning up unused resources, keeping your gameplay lag-free and efficient, especially on mod-heavy setups.

## 🚀 Key Features
### 💾 Dynamic Memory Management:
Regularly checks and cleans up system memory to minimize lag spikes and prevent memory bloat. Apollo ensures your game can handle large builds, intense battles, and complex mods without a hitch.

### 🎨 VRAM Optimization:
Monitors GPU memory usage and automatically clears unused textures and framebuffers, so your graphics card stays optimized. Perfect for players using shaders or high-resolution texture packs!

### 🔥 Particle Pooling:
Manages particle resources using an Object Pool, reusing resources to reduce memory load. Especially useful for mods with heavy particle effects, Apollo keeps visuals smooth and stunning.

### ⚙️ Configurable Cleanup Intervals (Customizable!):
New Config Folder 📁 – Set your own interval times to control how often memory and VRAM are cleaned! Easily configurable via a generated settings file for total customization to suit your system's needs.

### 🌐 Server-Ready Design:
Runs seamlessly in server environments with automatic lifecycle handling. Apollo’s optimizations work during gameplay and gracefully shut down when the server stops, ensuring a stable long-term experience.

## 🛠️ How It Works
Apollo Memory & VRAM Optimizer runs in the background to maintain optimal performance while you play. With auto-generated configuration files, you can adjust cleanup intervals without hassle. Apollo’s features work together to prevent memory leaks and GPU overload, giving you a seamless gaming experience.

1. **Automatic Cleanup Intervals:** Cleans unused resources every few seconds (interval customizable) to prevent buildup.
2. **On-Demand Cleanup:** Need an instant boost? Apollo can be configured for specific cleanup commands.
3. **Easy Configuration:** Just check the config folder for Apollo’s settings file and set the intervals to your liking.

## 🎮 Why Apollo?
- **Improved FPS & Stability:** Experience smoother gameplay with fewer stutters.
- **No Manual Cleanup Needed:** Set it and forget it—Apollo takes care of memory management for you.
- **Perfect for Modded Minecraft:** Handles the demands of mod packs with ease.

🚀 Download Apollo Memory & VRAM Optimizer today and enjoy a better, smoother Minecraft experience with worry-free memory management!


```
⚡ This project is still in development so if you encounter any issues, make sure to report them on the github page!
```
